subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Busch turned a lap of 178.416 miles per hour at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., to win the pole for Sunday’s Windows 10 400.
snippet: Busch turned a lap of 178.416 miles per hour at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., to win the pole for Sunday’s Windows 10 400.
